title: Massive Ping Spikes and Dcs With On mac over the past few days.
body:
Over the past few days i've gotten insane ping spikes over the past few days with some going up to 10000.
Im with TPG and was wandering what the heck is going on because this never happens during the day for me.
Is it something to do with the actual RIOT server this time? or is it really TPG?
I'm wondering if anyone else has had these issues Cheers and thanks for any advise possible.
